Title: subtractTupleOfIntervals
Description: Consecutively subtracts a tuple of intervals from a Date or a DateTime.
date: First interval or interval of tuples. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64.intervals: Tuple of intervals to subtract from date. tuple(interval).
Returns date with subtracted intervals. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64.
Examples: WITH toDate('2018-01-01') AS date SELECT subtractTupleOfIntervals(date, (INTERVAL 1 DAY, INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
